thread.title: No One Can Get Enough Of This Otter Sliding Down A Snowy Hill
thread.title_full: No One Can Get Enough Of This Otter Sliding Down A Snowy Hill

author: Hilary Hanson
title: No One Can Get Enough Of This Otter Sliding Down A Snowy Hill
text:
No One Can Get Enough Of This Otter Sliding Down A Snowy Hill No one with any sense, that is. 02/08/2017 02:48 pm ET Hilary Hanson Trends Editor, The Huffington Post 
When’s the last time you experienced — or even witnessed — total unbridled joy? 
If it’s been a while, or really, even if it’s only been, like, a minute, take this golden opportunity to watch this river otter sliding down a snowy hill. 
Wildlife photographer Barrett Hedges shot the footage in Yellowstone National Park and posted it on his Facebook page , BearHead Photography, last week. 
For reasons that should be obvious to anyone with even a mild appreciation for cute animals, the adorably mesmerizing clip went crazy viral. And people had a pretty strong emotional response. I just cried at a video of an otter sliding on its belly down a hill covered in snow
